title: Structured Training Program for AI-Driven Educational Tool Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and specialized expertise in social sciences
context.additional_context: Learners use personal devices via BYOD (Bring Your Own Device), aiming to integrate AI tools immediately applicable in real work environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain and apply ethical principles for using LLM tools like ChatGPT in educational settings
Learners can design and implement personalized educational scenarios using AI tools according to a structured training framework
Learners produce outcomes applying AI integration to solve real-world social sector tasks through project-based assessments
Learners can identify privacy issues arising from AI tool usage and propose solutions
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
